Stand up desks Improved

Without a healthy earth, no one can survive

Air pollution for example, is already a major problem threatening the liveability of cities in emerging countries around the world. No one should worry about their children growing up in a world where the only fresh air they breathe is through a respirator mask.

Unfortunately this reality is happening now, faster than we’d like to acknowledge it. What about clean air, clean water, protecting forests, animal habitat and wildlife conservation? These things are essential to the survival, health and well being of humankind and all life forms on earth.

Too often, we take these for granted as we lead technology fuelled, always rushing lives in major urban centres, where these issues of global importance, are out of sight and out of mind.

Daniel Angelini | Founder of MOVI Workspace

  • Philosophy (current)
  • Sustainability
  • Charity
  • Legacy
  • Philosophy (current)
  • Sustainability
  • Charity
  • Legacy

Philosophy

The Movi Workspace team have sustainability at the heart of everything we do. From making sure that the materials we use are ethically sourced, to supporting wildlife conservation groups around the globe, every single decision we make is built upon a solid foundation of sustainability. Our mission is to demonstrate how easy it can be for businesses to dramatically reduce their environmental impacts, and invest in regenerating the environment.

SUSTAINABILITY

Each and every piece of timber that we use on the MOVI Workspace is ecologically sourced. Our timber comes from well managed, renewable forests that are Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified. This means that the forests are managed ethically to provide environmental, social and economic benefits.

SUSTAINABILITY

Each and every piece of timber that we use on the MOVI Workspace is ecologically sourced. Our timber comes from well managed, renewable forests that are Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified. This means that the forests are managed ethically to provide environmental, social and economic benefits.

CHARITY

Wildlife conservation groups provide so much vital care to this ever changing world and they should not be doing this alone. We feel that it is our duty to contribute. We are so dedicated to supporting this invaluable work, that we are donating to a wildlife conservation group in the country you’re purchasing, every time a MOVI stand up desk is brought.

LEGACY

As stewards of this earth, each and every one of us have a duty to preserve it’s beauty and wonder. It’s vital that all of us contribute to decrease the affects of climate change and protect our world from further damage, leaving a beautiful place for future generations to flourish. What we do now and how we impact the world is our legacy.
